title: Pegasus Forced Me Gay:
description: Max is a recently single model from California, looking for a weekend getaway to get his mind off his breakup with some friends. After finding a cute little bed and breakfast to crash the night at, he decides to take a walk around the neighboring private beaches and forest that line the shores. What he stumbles across next will change his life! This is a 3,500 word hardcore gay erotic story, featuring anal, oral sex, mind control and cream pies. Not suitable for under 18!
author: Hunter Fox
